import React,{Component} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; class Contact extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { contact : {} } } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://localhost/contact/1') .then(res => { this.setState({ contact : res.data.result }) }) } render(){ return ( <>

); } } export default Contact;
